name: Less U move | More U shoot
name_original: Less U move | More U shoot
description:
In this unique twin stick shooter players has to decide if they wanna shoot fast, or move fast! 

Use  WSAD to move, Mouse to aim, and SPACE to break your momentum!

Can you defeat all enemies?

Hope you will ejnoy it!

If you Play it outside of BTP game jam keep in mind that I had limited time to finish this project, so it might be a bit rough in some places
